item.title: Using Veeam Backup Copy via iSCSI Target on Synology NAS over WireGuard Tunnel
item.description: A step-by-step guide to configure Veeam Backup Copy to a Synology NAS over a secure WireGuard VPN tunnel using iSCSI and ReFS.
